Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers I
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers II
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers III
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers IV
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers V
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and cocaine metabolite test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Chemistry Products COCM assay and associated calibrators and controls for detection of benzoylecgonine and other drugs of abuse in urine using enzyme immunoassay on VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry System
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use in the semi-quantitative or qualitative determination of benzoylecgonine (cocaine metabolite) in human urine to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of cocaine use or overdose; calibrators and controls for urine drugs of abuse screening assays on VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry Systems
